description: Defines the certified procedure for addressing critical model instability identified by MPAM ($ S_{04} $) or MDMP audit failures. Ensures automated, immediate stabilization or quarantine measures are applied to the relevant models (CMR entries) before the next GSEP-C cycle commences.
trigger_criteria: MPAM Veto (S3) exceeding CFTM thresholds for $ S_{04} $ failure rate over N cycles.

remediation_actions.level_1: Automatic constraint application (rate limiting or complexity capping) on the unstable model, logged to CALS.
remediation_actions.level_2: Temporary suspension of the model from S7 metric generation, forcing fallback to certified prior-generation model.
remediation_actions.level_3: Model quarantine, requiring mandatory human-supervised PEUP validation/retraining before re-entry into CMR.

integration_point: Pre-S3 Check (The result of MRCE analysis serves as an input constraint to S3: Model Stability Gate.
